elements.name: Verify navigate to ABDirect Splash & Login and titles of the pages

steps.name: I open the browser
I navigate to "https://abdirectcloud.abbl.com/welcome-page"
I should see the page title "ABDirect"
I click on the Login Button
I navigate to the Login Page and can see login title "Log In to Your Account"

elements.name: Verify Successful Login With Device Binding

steps.name: I login with "efticardtest" and "123456@Aa"
I should see OTP Channel Selection Modal for Device Binding "We found a new device, would you like to bind it to continue?"

arguments.val: "We found a new device, would you like to bind it to continue?"

steps.name: I verify 2fa Successfully With SMS "1111"
I navigate to my dashboard

elements.name: Validate Dashboard, Account Details, Statement Download, DPS, FDR & Loan

steps.name: I navigate to my dashboard
I can see my Accounts
I click on any Account
I can see mini details of my Account
I click on View Statement from the mini details
I can see the Statement search by Account and able to download statements

elements.name: Validate Dashboard, Card Details, Statement Download, Endorsement Info & Unbilled Transaction

steps.name: I navigate to my dashboard
I can click on the Card Tab to see my Credit Cards
I click on any Card
I can see mini details of the card
I click on the Info button
I can see Card details
I can see Card Endorsement Info
I can see and download Card Transaction History
I can see Card Unbilled Transaction
I navigate to my dashboard
I navigate to the Own Account Fund Transfer

steps.name: I can see my Account list to transfer money
I select an Account to transfer money
I navigated to the transfer details screen with a selected from account and available balance populated
I input transfer amount "50" below my available balance and remarks and confirm next to continue
I can see transaction details screen, select OTP channel, accept the terms and confirm next to continue by OTP verification "1111"
I can see transaction confirmation screen with success or fail status and the details of the transactions
I can download the transaction receipt
I can add the transaction to favourite "OwnFT"
I can navigate to home clicking Go To Home
I navigate to "https://abdirectcloud.abbl.com/project/bank-account"
I navigate to my dashboard
I navigate to the Within Account Fund Transfer

steps.name: I select To Currency, Select payment amount, Input Payment Amount "50", Remarks "test" and confirm next to continue
I can see transaction review screen for Own Card Payment, select currency, select OTP channel, accept the terms and click confirm to continue by OTP verification "1111"
I can see transaction confirmation screen with success or fail status and the details of the transactions
I can download the payment receipt
I can navigate to home clicking Go To Home
